name: Supermarket VR and mini-games
description: With this games you can go shopping! You will feel for the first time what future purchases will be like from your home or workplace. You will have to buy the products from a shopping list, with money and a limited time. And you will also have to avoid colliding with the other people who are buying.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 8.1 Processor: Intel i3-6100 / AMD Ryzen 3 1200, FX4350 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1050 Ti/AMD Radeon RX 470 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2 GB available space
